content.raw:
We are working on making a scoring script public. You'll be able to use the script to self-score.

AFAIK there is no error threshold that one has to achieve in order to pass qual1. The number of teams that pass the qualify round is limited, which in turn means the best teams will win. In order to determine who is best we will look at accuracy and consistency.
content.html:
We are working on making a scoring script public. You'll be able to use the script to self-score.

AFAIK there is no error threshold that one has to achieve in order to pass qual1. The number of teams that pass the qualify round is limited, which in turn means the best teams will win. In order to determine who is best we will look at accuracy and consistency.
